snippet: Christopher Bedford of the Wexner Center for the Arts at Ohio State will be the new director of the Rose Art Museum at Brandeis University.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Brandeis University appoints Christopher Bedford as the new director of the Rose Art Museum; exhibit of abstract light films by British artist Anthony McCall will be screened at the Tate Modern in London; Jay Sander, former art dealer and independent curator, is named a full-time curator at the Whitney Museum of American Art.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Bedford of the Wexner Center for the Arts at Ohio State will be the new director of the Rose Art Museum at Brandeis University.

headline.seo: Brandeis Names New Head for Rose Art Museum
headline.main: New Director Chosen for Brandeis Museum
